text:
Hi, I am just new to HubSpot and Hubdb,
I struggling for get the video and image from HubDB to Module. Then I want to use this module for webpage, any help please.

is there any reason I can’t pull the ‘columnCount’ value from a hubdb table? ``` {% set table_info = hubdb_table(-------) %}
        {{ table_info.columnCount }}```
